actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reduce the five-month waiting period for disability benefits to one month and provide for retroactive payments.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to reduce the five month waiting period which is presently a prerequisite of eligibility for disability insurance benefits to one month.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reduce the five-month waiting period for disability benefits to one month and provide for retroactive payments.
